game.name: Flip Hammy
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Flip Hammy is a 2D puzzle game with unique stages that you can flip its face. Let's clear simple rules puzzles with Hammy!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Flip Hammy is a 2D puzzle game with unique stages that you can flip its face. Let's clear simple rules puzzles with Hammy!
